properties.areaDesc: Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island; St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E. Potagannissing Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 16 at 3:24AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 3
feet expected.

* WHERE...In Lake Huron, Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of
Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island. In Lake Superior,
St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E. Potagannissing Bay.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
